channel.title: Developing a Bot Client
channel.description:
Hi,
I have almost completed my RS2 Bot project since the Nuke a few months ago. This bot now requires BETA testers, prior to public release sometime soon.
Certain Anti-Ban methods have been employed to prevent the risk of account bans. A few basic skilling scripts are included (autofighter, miner, fisher, cgoogle etc).
As a BETA tester, you will be responsible for reporting BUGS/ERRORS in both the client itself and the current scripts, making suggestionsand recommendations where possible. Contributors will receive a free licence once it hit's the market.
If you would like to see a sneak preview, or to test the bot itself, please add my contact details.
MSN: <snip>
Thank you.

item.title: Developing a Bot Client
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

Confirmed trojan, what a numnuts.

Read full topic
